sentence.Network_en: The next day dawned, thankfully with a drop in wind and waves.
sentence.Network_cn: 幸运的是，第二天天亮时，风浪平静了些。

sentence.Network_en: Thankfully the smoking of cigarettes is on the decline.
sentence.Network_cn: 令人欣慰的是，吸烟量在逐渐下降。

sentence.Network_en: Thankfully, it wasn't smothered in stringy cheese like some pizzas.
sentence.Network_cn: 幸好它不像有些比萨饼那样上面涂满了难嚼的奶酪。

list.abs: his ring i do accept most thankfully ., 他的戒指我十分感激的收下.
He accepted thankfully my apologies ., 他很感激地接受了我的道歉.
They came out of the tunnel and thankfully breathed the fresh air ., 他们走出地道 , 贪婪地吸着新鲜空气.
I got streetcar in a downpour and thankfully opened the umbrella to protect myself ., 我倾盆大雨中下了车 , 感激不尽地打开那把伞遮雨.

entry.def: You use thankfully in order to express approval or happiness about a statement that you are making.

example.ex: The next day dawned, thankfully with a drop in wind and waves.
example.tran: 幸运的是，第二天天亮时，风浪平静了些。

sentences.sentence: "thankfully he didn't come to the party"

auth_sentence.content: Thankfully I managed to put down a solid run.
auth_sentence.res_content: Thankfully I managed to put down a solid run.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Thankfully I managed to put down a solid run.

auth_sentence.content: The lowlights on The English Riviera are thankfully rare.
auth_sentence.res_content: The lowlights on The English Riviera are thankfully rare.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The lowlights on The English Riviera are thankfully rare.

auth_sentence.content: So far, so grimace-inducing, though thankfully Sound.
auth_sentence.res_content: So far, so grimace-inducing, though thankfully Sound.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So far, so grimace-inducing, though thankfully Sound.

sentences.en: He’s been extremely sick, but thankfully he’s off the danger list now.
sentences.cn: 他一度病入膏肓,不过万幸的是,他现在已经脱离危险了。

sentences.en: They came out of the tunnel and thankfully breathed the fresh air.
sentences.cn: 他们走出地道,贪婪地吸着新鲜空气。

sentences.en: Thankfully,he sank back into his comfortable chair;someone else would do the job.
sentences.cn: 那件工作将由另一个人去做,他颇感欣慰地坐到他那把舒适的椅子上。
